meanings.definition: To remove from a mounting or support.
meanings.sent1: She carefully demounted the picture frame from the wall.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic demounted the engine to fix the issue.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel demounted the bird feeder for a snack.
meanings.sent4: He demounted the old beliefs to make room for new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The astronaut demounted the satellite with precision.

meanings.sent1: The toy robot was demounted for cleaning.
meanings.sent2: The team demounted the tent after the camping trip.
meanings.sent3: The magician demounted the trick to reveal its secrets.
meanings.sent4: She demounted the puzzle to start solving it.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic demounted the car engine to replace a part.
